name: Lego Jurassic World
summary: Lego Jurassic World is a 2015 Lego action-adventure video game developed by Traveller's Tales and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, which was released for the PlayStation 4, PlayStation 3, PlayStation Vita, Nintendo 3DS, Wii U, Xbox One, Xbox 360, and Microsoft Windows. It adapts the plots of all four films in the Jurassic Park franchise. The game was released on 12 June 2015 to coincide with Jurassic World‍ '​s theatrical release.
